statements.query: drop stream if exists test_join
create stream test_join (id string, type string)
insert into test_join(id, type) values ('dev1', 'roof'), ('dev2', 'field'), ('dev3', 'window'), ('dev4', 'wall')
insert into test_join(id, type) values ('dev5', 'roof'), ('dev6', 'window'), ('dev7', 'wall'), ('dev8', 'floor')

comments: Tests covering query state checkpointing smoke test cases

tests.name: tail
tests.description: tail state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists state_stream2
create stream state_stream2 (id string, location string, value float, timestamp datetime64(3) default now64(3))
subscribe to select id, value from state_stream2 settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into state_stream2(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev1', 'ca', 57.3, '2020-02-02 20:00:00')
unsubscribe to '1950'

tests.name: recover-from
tests.description: recover tail query from a state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists state_stream2
create stream state_stream2 (id string, location string, value float, timestamp datetime64(3) default now64(3))
subscribe to select id, value from state_stream2 settings checkpoint_interval=1

insert into state_stream2(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev2', 'ca', 58.3, '2020-02-02 20:00:01')
recover from '1951'

tests.name: tumble_window_aggr_with_delay_interval
tests.description: tumble window aggregation with delay interval state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists state_stream2
create stream state_stream2 (id string, location string, value float, timestamp datetime64(3) default now64(3))

subscribe to select emit_version() as emit_version, id, count(*), window_start, window_end from tumble(state_stream2, timestamp, interval 5 second) group by id, window_start, window_end emit stream after watermark and delay interval 2 second settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into state_stream2(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev1', 'ca', 57.3, '2020-02-02 20:00:00')
insert into state_stream2(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev1', 'ca', 66, '2020-02-02 20:00:01')
insert into state_stream2(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev2', 'ca', 58.3, '2020-02-02 20:00:02')
insert into state_stream2(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev8', 'ca', 67, '2020-02-02 20:00:06')
insert into state_stream2(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev2', 'ca', 58.3, '2020-02-02 20:00:04')
insert into state_stream2(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev8', 'ca', 67, '2020-02-02 20:00:08')
unsubscribe to '1967'

tests.name: session_window_aggr
tests.description: session window aggregation state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists state_stream2
create stream state_stream2 (id string, location string, value float, timestamp datetime64(3) default now64(3))
subscribe to select id, max(value), window_start, window_end from session(state_stream2, timestamp, 2s) group by id, window_start, window_end settings checkpoint_interval=1
